about_us.heading: About UniJobLink
about_us.heading_description: UniJobLink is a platform that connects students, companies, and educational institutions across Myanmar to streamline internship opportunities.
about_us.heaing_description2: Whether you‚Äôre a student seeking real-world experience, a company offering valuable learning opportunities, or a university guiding students toward success, UniJobLink is built to empower all parties involved effectively.
about_us.mission_description: Empowering students by providing access to real-world experiences through trusted internships. Helping companies discover passionate talents and build future-ready teams.
about_us.vision_description: To become Myanmar‚Äôs leading internship platform that connects, supports, and transforms student and organizational journeys into meaningful career pathways.

why_internlink_description.text4: Notifications, saved job posts, and tracking tools
why_internlink_description.text6: Built with modern technologies (Next.js, Node.js, MySQL, Prisma)

contact_us.greeting: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you're a student, company, or university, feel free to reach out to UniJobLink for any inquiries, suggestions, or support.

step1.title: Create Profile
step1.description: Build your student profile to showcase your skills and interests.

step2.title: Browse Jobs

step3.title: Apply & Connect
step3.description: Apply directly and get connected with hiring managers.
